summary: This modification adds some Songs from Malukah, BardMichaelKeally and other into Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This modification gives Bards some songs from [b]BardMichaelKelly, Malukah[/b] and [b]Xendragons[/b] (more about the artists in the readme file and credits).

I finished my work to this mod, but converted its latest version to SSE ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15917]SSE download page[/url]).

[*][b][u]Mod Features:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Songs are synchronized with bard lips.

[*]Not every bard will sing every song.

[/list]
[*][b][u]Songlist:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]"Tale of tongues" by Xenadragons
[*]"The Age of Aggressions" by Malukah
[*]"The Age of Oppression" by BardMichaelKelly
[*]"The Age of Oppression" by Malukah
[*]"The Dragonborn comes" by Malukah
[/list]
[*][b][u]Version 2.4:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Added Mahlukas "The Age of Oppression"
[/list]
[*][b][u]Version 2.3:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Added BardMichaelKellys "Age of Oppression"
[/list]
[*][b][u]Version 2.2:[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]Added Xenadragons "Tale of tongues"
[*]Malukahs Age of Aggression don't replace Age of Oppression anymore
[*]Synchronization optimized
[*]Some minor fixes
[/list]

[i][b]Have Fun![/b][/i]
author: Nic0h and Music by different Artists
